mutants.code:
def merge_sort_iterative(lst):
    if len(lst) < 1:
        return lst
    width = 1
    while width < len(lst):
        left = 0
        while left < len(lst):
            right = min(left + 2 * width, len(lst))
            mid = left + width
            left_half = lst[left:mid]
            right_half = lst[mid:right]
            lst[left:right] = sorted(left_half + right_half, reverse=True)
            left += 2 * width
        width *= 2
    return lst

    if len(lst) > 1:

            right_half = lst[mid:right]
            lst[left:right] = sorted(left_half + right_half, reverse=True)
            left += 2 * width

    return lst
